name: MetallicBuddy
description:
*This game was only partially done by me as it was a school project*
Most of the credits goes to my HEAJ school teachers.

"Play a killer robot in an action game where you have to reach your teleporter to get back to your ship ! 3 Levels are playable with 2 different ennemies, power ups, and super power."

It was one of the first school project i worked on by doing :
-All the VFXs
-Tower ennemies
-HUD
-Texturing
-A lot of little things not worth to list
